overview_summary: Neighboring landowners include a major family-run cattle operation and a private family trust. Lake Majestik LLC (Cornelison family) is a large-scale ranch and employer known for land stewardship, likely to prioritize preserving agricultural land. The Pilote Family Trust represents individual landowners with no public profile or clear stance on development.

neighbors.name: Lake Majestik LLC
neighbors.claims: Lake Majestik, LLC (dba Lake Majestik Farms) is a large cattle ranch in Flat Rock (Jackson County), Alabama, owned and operated by Royce Cornelison and his son Nic Cornelison [Beef Tips (Brangus blog)](https://gobrangus.wordpress.com/2014/06/20/101-ranch-brangus-cows-find-new-home-at-lake-majestik-farms/). The ranch spans approximately 4,600 acres (with about 2,700 acres of pasture dedicated to Brangus cattle) in northeast Alabama [Farm Credit (Building a Brand)](https://www.findfarmcredit.com/landscapes-articles/building-a-brand). Combined with the Cornelisons’ construction business, Lake Majestik employs 57 full-time workers, making the family one of the community’s largest employers [Farm Credit (Building a Brand)](https://www.findfarmcredit.com/landscapes-articles/building-a-brand). The Cornelison family has placed hundreds of acres under conservation easements to prevent commercial development (such as surface mining) and protect the land’s rural character [Farm Credit (Building a Brand)](https://www.findfarmcredit.com/landscapes-articles/building-a-brand).
neighbors.influence_justification: Owns ~4,600 acres; One of the largest local employers; Active in land conservation

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage principal owner (Royce or Nic Cornelison) directly with assurances that development will respect agricultural land; anticipate concern for land preservation given their conservation track record.

neighbors.name: Trustees of the Pilote Family Trust (Pierre & Angela Ruth Pilote)
neighbors.influence_justification: Private landowners; no public information on community role
